import React,{useState} from 'react' import './ExpenseForm.css' const ExpenseForm = () => { const[enteredTitle,setEnteredTitle] = useState('') const titleChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) } const amountChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) } const dateChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) } return (
) } export default ExpenseForm
